articles.description: Vivo Y200 5G was unveiled in India in October 2023. Now the company has announced that the phone will be available in a new storage variant. The company also confirmed the price cut for two of its other models, the Vivo Y27 4G and the Vivo T2 5G, launched in …
articles.content: Vivo Y200 5G was unveiled in India in October last year. It is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 SoC and is backed by a 4,800mAh battery with 44W fast charging support. Now the company has ann… [+2247 chars]
